metadata.title: CVE-2017-6504 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
WebUI in qBittorrent before 3.3.11 did not set the X-Frame-Options header, which could potentially lead to clickjacking.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6504` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

qbittorrent - 4.0.3-1
qbittorrent-nox - 4.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qbittorrent package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-1').
